line_1: And pleasure wooes us with a harmless lure;
line_2: In early youth, when all our joys are pure,

line_1: My friends, my followers they basely lure;
line_2: My castle vainly have I built so sure

line_1: My friends, my followers they basely lure;
line_2: While from their treacherous wiles my life is insecure.

line_1: Discern the fraud beneath the specious lure,
line_2: Prevent the danger, or prescribe the cure.

line_1: She dazzling interest gave to lure;
line_2: If flattering praise could not secure,

line_1: In vain Persuasion spreads her silken lure,
line_2: Thine, sacred FRIENDSHIP, permanent as pure;

line_1: "Let not my peaceful name be made a lure
line_2: "From hands rapacious and from tongues impure:
